..
  ## AUTOGENERATED TITLE START

.. _alg-enmapbox-exportspectralprofiles:

************************
Export spectral profiles
************************

..
  ## AUTOGENERATED TITLE END

..
  ## AUTOGENERATED DESCRIPTION START

..
  ## AUTOGENERATED DESCRIPTION END

..
  ## AUTOGENERATED PARAMETERS START

**Parameters**

:guilabel:`Spectral library` [vector]
    A `vector layer <https://enmap-box.readthedocs.io/en/latest/general/glossary.html#term-vector-layer>`_ with SpectralProfile `fields <https://enmap-box.readthedocs.io/en/latest/general/glossary.html#term-field>`_

:guilabel:`Selected only` [boolean]
    Export only profiles from selected `features <https://enmap-box.readthedocs.io/en/latest/general/glossary.html#term-feature>`_
    Default: *False*

:guilabel:`Profile Field` [field]
    The `field <https://enmap-box.readthedocs.io/en/latest/general/glossary.html#term-field>`_ that contains the `spectral profiles <https://enmap-box.readthedocs.io/en/latest/general/glossary.html#term-spectral-profile>`_ to export

:guilabel:`Profile Name Expression` [expression]
    An expression to generate a name for each profile
    Default: *format\('Profile %1', $id\)*

**Outputs**

:guilabel:`Output File` [fileDestination]
    The file to write `spectral profiles <https://enmap-box.readthedocs.io/en/latest/general/glossary.html#term-spectral-profile>`_ to. Supported formats:\<ul\>\<li\>Geopackage \(\*.gpkg\)\</li\>\<li\>EcoSIS text file \(\*.csv\)\</li\>\<li\>GeoJSON \(\*.geojson\)\</li\>\<li\>ENVI Spectral Library \(\*.sli\)\</li\>\</ul\>

..
  ## AUTOGENERATED PARAMETERS END

..
  ## AUTOGENERATED COMMAND USAGE START

**Command-line usage**

``>qgis_process help enmapbox:exportspectralprofiles``::

    ----------------
    Arguments
    ----------------

    INPUT: Spectral library
        A vector layer with SpectralProfile fields
        Argument type:    vector
        Acceptable values:
            - Path to a vector layer
    SELECTED_ONLY: Selected only
        Default value:    false
        Export only profiles from selected features
        Argument type:    boolean
        Acceptable values:
            - 1 for true/yes
            - 0 for false/no
            - field:FIELD_NAME to use a data defined value taken from the FIELD_NAME field
            - expression:SOME EXPRESSION to use a data defined value calculated using a custom QGIS expression
    FIELD: Profile Field
        The field that contains the spectral profiles to export
        Argument type:    field
        Acceptable values:
            - The name of an existing field
            - ; delimited list of existing field names
    PROFILE_NAME: Profile Name Expression
        Default value:    format('Profile %1', $id)
        An expression to generate a name for each profile
        Argument type:    expression
        Acceptable values:
            - A valid QGIS expression string, e.g "road_name" = 'MAIN RD'
    OUTPUT: Output File
        The file to write spectral profiles to. Supported formats:<ul><li>Geopackage (*.gpkg)</li><li>EcoSIS text file (*.csv)</li><li>GeoJSON (*.geojson)</li><li>ENVI Spectral Library (*.sli)</li></ul>
        Argument type:    fileDestination
        Acceptable values:
            - Path for new file

    ----------------
    Outputs
    ----------------

    OUTPUT: <outputFile>
        Output File

..
  ## AUTOGENERATED COMMAND USAGE END
